name: Hostellerie de la Reine-Jeanne

reviews.text: The last time I stayed at La Reine-Jeanne was in 2003. However, I have stayed there several times, in July and in February. I must say that it is NOT for those who want 4 star accommodations.
reviews.title: One of my favorite hotels

aka: Hostellerie De La Reine-Jeanne Provence, France
